BillingAccount.name: BillingAccount
BillingAccount.description: Represents the customer's billing controls in the backend system. Used to set up and maintain details such as bill frequency, bill format, and autopay details.

BillCopiesRequested.description: The number of bill copies per month requested by the customer.

BillingEmailAddress.description: Email address to use for email delivery of bills.

ContactPreferenceType.description: Specifies the preferred method of communications to the contacts in this account such as mail, email or phone.

CreditRating.description: The credit rating of the customer

CreditScore.description: The credit score of the customer

CustomerClass.description: Speficies the grouping of accounts by attributes such as residential, small or medium businesses etc. Used to drive accounting processes, business logic, and validation rules.

ExtlBillCycle.description: Specifies the grouping that controls when a bill is produced.

ExtlBillDeliveryMethod.description: Specifies the chosen method to receive bills.

ExtlBillFormat.description: Specifies the format of the bill that the customer receives, such as a detailed or a summary bill.

ExtlBillFrequency.description: Specifies the the frequency at which bills are generated such as Monthly, Quarterly or Weekly.

ExtlReferenceIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the billing system.

ExtlTaxExmpEndDate.description: The date until which the tax exemption is valid.

ExtlTaxExmpPercentage.description: Tax exemption percentage the account is eligible for.

ExtlTaxExmpStartDate.description: The date from which the tax exemption is valid.

ExtlTaxExmpType.description: Specifies the type of tax exemption the account is eligible for.

ExtlTaxIdentifier.description: The external tax identifier number for this customer.

IsAutopayEnabled.description: Indicates whether the customer has opted for automatic payment.

IsBillingHold.description: Indicates whether billing is suspended on this customer's account

PrimaryBillAddr.description: Address to which bills are to be sent

Status.description: Specifies the status of the customer billing account.

TmpBillingAddr.description: The alternative address if the bill should not be sent to the customer's primary address

TmpBillingAddrEndDate.description: The end date when the alternate billing address should be used

TmpBillingAddrStartDate.description: The start date when the alternate billing address should be used
